comments:
Build ID: I20070608-1718

Steps To Reproduce:
I got a NPE if I try to open XML file. The editor shows the content but if I try to select something I get a NPE.

I assume it has a problem to download the DTD of the doctype, because I use a network proxy. And I assume further that the editor doesn't use the proxy settings under "General/Network Connection". But it's only a guess

XML file which I try to edit in the editor

I have the same problem (NPE on 322 line) when editing JPA's persistence.xml.
OS Windows XP Home SP2, 
Sun JDK 1.6, Eclipse 3.3.0 I20070608-1718
WST 2.0.0.v200706041905-7C-08k0IUlO85UfhKjOqDGxnekUc
The expection doesn't occur anymore in Europa final. So, I assume that it is fixed.
I have the same problem in eclipse Version: 3.3.0 Build id: I20070621-1340, with java 1.5.6 and Windows XP SP2. I get this error regardless which xml file I'm editing.

I see this same exception as well:

Version: 3.3.0
Build id: I20070621-1340

Mac OS X 10.4.10 (8R218)

I have the subclipse plug-in (1.2.0) along with whatever else comes w/ the basic install of Europa.

When editing an XML, I get the exception after any key-presses.
This looks like a duplicate of bug #174919 although the feedback here is that the NPE is being thrown for "any" XML file (comment #4 and comment #5).
Fixed with bug 174919 and improvements to selection.isEmpty().
Stephan, I've never been able to consistently reproduce this problem so I'm hesitant to verify it being fixed myself.  It should be fixed in our recent 2.0.1 RC builds.
